CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS customers ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL )
INSERT INTO CUSTOMERS (NAME, EMAIL, CREATED_AT) VALUES (:Name, :Email, :CreatedAt) RETURNING ID INTO :Id
SELECT ID, NAME, EMAIL, CREATED_AT FROM CUSTOMERS WHERE ID = :Id
